name: 10 Questions about Movies and TV | Entertainment

questions.text: What was the name of the dog on the 'Brady Bunch'?
questions.explanation:
Tiger.

	According to the book, 'Growing Up Brady' by Barry Williams, the original Tiger was ran over by a florist truck. The replacement dog was found the next day in the pound by the trainer. The replacement dog was such a bad actor that they restricted his appearances. The dog wasn't written entirely out of the show until Season 3.

questions.text: What was the name of Norm's wife on 'Cheers'?
questions.explanation:
Vera.

	This show ran for 11 seasons and never once did you ever see her face. There was a Thanksgiving episode where she walked into the room, but was hit in the face with a pie so she still remains a mystery.

questions.text: What was the actress' name who played Jo on 'Facts of Life'?
questions.explanation:
Nancy McKeon.

	Yes, it was Nancy. But did you know that George Clooney also played in 'The Facts Of Life?

questions.text: In which 'Lethal Weapon' did Mel Gibson have to track down and kill the men who were responsible for the death of his wife?
questions.explanation:
'Lethal Weapon II'.

	In the movie Mel Gibson found out, while being tortured, that the bad guy was the one who killed his wife before the first movie. He was actually trying to kill Mel, but he was not in the car they ran off the road and blew up.

questions.text: What is the name of the actor who played Mr. Kotter in 'Welcome Back, Kotter'?
questions.explanation:
Gabe Kaplan.

	Gabe Kaplan has not acted since the show was cancelled on August 10, 1979. Kaplan has since become a master gambler and is banned from many casinos in Atlantic City and Las Vegas due to his ability of constantly winning. He has written several books on how to beat the house and, believe it or not, is worth more today than John Travolta.

questions.text: What is the name of the movie that Kevin Bacon appeared in, where he fell victim to a serial killer in the woods?
What is the name of the guest star on the 'A-Team who drove the van, other than the team members?
questions.explanation:
Boy George.

	Strangly enough it was Boy George. Murdoch did most of the driving, but the 'A-Team' had a real funny habit of never letting any of the guest stars drive the van for fear of cancellation.

questions.text: The very first episode of 'Cheers' aired in September of 1982. In the first scene Diane walks in with a man, what was the name of that man?
questions.explanation:
Sumner Sloan.

	Diane was getting ready to run off and marry her professor, who received a call from his ex-wife at the bar and left Diane in the lurch. This started her employement at the bar and romance with Sam. Personally, she was my least favorite character on the show's 225 episodes.

questions.text: What was the name of the actor who played 'Dallas' in 'The Outsiders'?
questions.explanation:
Matt Dillon.

	Matt Dillion starred in many movies. 'The Outsiders' is one of the most popular. He played Dallas, a young deliquent who was feared by everyone. Dallas didn't get along with anyone, and had no real love toward anyone, other than Johnny Cade.

questions.text: What is Joey's favorite food on the television show, 'Friends'?
questions.explanation:
Sandwiches.

	Joey's favorite food was revealed while playing a trivia game that Ross came up with, when Chandler and Joey bet Monica and Rachel who knew more about whom. That is when Joey and Chandler moved into Monica's apartment after winning the contest.
